channel.title: Player Rights Problem Moparscape Aryan 3.2
channel.description:
Hi everyone,
When I change my player rights to 3, I am able to use any of the commands in game.
When I change my player rights to 1 or 2, I am a moderator, but I cannot use any of the commands.
I am using Moparscape Aryan 3.2
Someone please help, it's been a week now!
Thanks

item.title: Player Rights Problem Moparscape Aryan 3.2
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Please stick to one thread per issue.

Read full topic

item.title: Player Rights Problem Moparscape Aryan 3.2
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

In your commands file, find where it says like "playerRights = " and change the number after the equals sign to whatever you want. If you want moderators and up to be able to use the command, change the number to a 1, if you want Administrators and above to use the command, give it a 2.

Read full topic
